Posts.Title: Pain after axillary clearance

Posts.Content: Hi all, I hade wide local excision and sentinel node biopsy 22 aug and the axillary clearance 16 sept, after the first op i felt great, but after the second i still feel really lousey, i'm tired all the time and have constant pain under my arm and down as far as my elbow, also the whole area including my shoullder is numb and movement is quite restricted and when i do move it more than usual i get sharp shooting pains down to my elbow...Has anyone else been left with these feelings and how long did they last... I am due to start chemo in 2 weeks time and am prepared for feeling even worse with that but the lack of ability to move my arm properly is realy starting to get me down.I would be grateful for anyone else experiences on this..Thanks
Posts.Title: Pain after axillary clearance

Posts.Content: Hi All Thanks for all the replies, i will persevere with excersises and hopefully things will improve. How long did it take anyone before they had enoough movement etc to drive again? I live in a village and it is driving me nuts ( pardon the pun) not being able to get out on my own. Best Wishes to all x dee
